casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Alvin Terrill FOSTER, Jr. No. 104PA04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 10, 2004. John G. Barnwell, Assistant Attorney General, G. Dewey Hudson, District Attorney, for State. James C. White, Durham, for Amicus. Seth H. Jaffe, Raleigh, for ACLU.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 10th day of August 2004 by Defendant to Amend Brief:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 10th day of August 2004."
